Thanks to my Super D Duper boyfriend and his totally rockin parents.....I have wheels, and by NO means is it a hoopty!  I am so excieted!  You wouldn't believe.....  It is so HOT! We were having some minor issues with it that the shop is taking care of for us, and Nick hates the rental they gave him, you know its customary to get a rental care if you are having issues with a new car. But by this time Monday I should have a car.......oh it is too sweet...


2001 VW Jette 1.8T  Tornado Red, Black leather interier, Auto, PW, PD 6 Disk CD Changer.....a HUGE trunk....I know I climb in.  Ok so I am so stoked....it's hard for me to sit still.
http://buttrflyxtac.livejournal.com/59751.html

ok, so it is fairly quiet here this evening.  It's nice, I should take the oppurtunity to read, but I am feeling pretty good.  Judy told me that her and George had been talking about transportation for me come the winter months,....Well if I do get this job as full-time they will be more then willing to Co-sign for a car for me....I was so stoked!  And, if anyone knows me I don't need anything fancy.....we already have a fancy car.  All I would need is something reliable, with heat and a radio.  Oh and doors that lock and windows that roll up and down.  Not real picky.  Besides that I have to be able to afford the insurance, and payments.  They're just helping a gurl get a dependable ride.  I love those guys they are so great! I am glad I could be part of such a great family, unlike my own sometimes.  Anyhow, my book is calling.
http://buttrflyxtac.livejournal.com/59485.html

Well, It is a bit of a mellow night out at the call center tonight.  I am a little bored, and not many folks to talk to....Life is good, Relationship is better then ever.  Finances should be coming along soon.  All I need is my own car.  Not that I am not ok sharing a car with nick, he has been really understanding, but it will only last a little while before everyone starts getting frustrated.  I don't have alot of money so I think cheap, and am looking for just somthing to get me to and from places, but nick, well he won't allow it....I think that he just worries about me breaking down somewhere and me becoming a part of the evening news, which I understand but......I am only trying to be realistic, besides working at AAA I get 75% discount on membership dues.  Besides most of my free time is spent with him, so....I don't know that is all that frustrates me really.  OOOOO, we got a few new fish 1 itty bitty angel the size of a dime, and 2 fan tailed pretties.  So ok well I can't write for an hour that would bored the shit out of everyone.  

TIP: if you guys are on the road, pay attention to all exits and mile posts, it helps your tow truck or your AAA or roadside assistance operator know where you at because typically they are not to familiar where you are located or about the area to begin with.  trust me I make a living at it LOL :D~

Alright, so it's been a while since I had something of importance to post.
I have a job through a temp agency, however my supervisor approached me, and asked
me to fill out an app so that when my temp contract is up, so they want me to come work 
for them.
$9 an hour plus compansation for upgrades, and at least 85% accuracy on my calls I can make 
up yo $400 a month plus whaty I get an hour.  On top of that I get benny's from day one, and well I won't have to train again so...yeah for me a job I like, people I liek to work for.  
On a side note something funny, first of all I will never look at my brother the same again....okay he is only 15, anyway my mom called to tell me something funny today, the funny thing was that she caught my brother in nothing but his socks and wife beater with his girlfriend in the room.......ok to me it's is funny from my stance as the sister, but how is that fucking funny to my mother, I wasn't even having sex and I always got grounded for supposivly having sex, and all he lost was his door and he gets to stay home alone while my parents go to 6 flags for a wk.  Arghhh I can't wait unitl mu little sister and brother prove me right and haver kids before I do, and mind you I am 22. they are 15 and 12.

Not that it's something I hoped for, but Shit happens.  And I am severly depressed.  I am not a gurl to break out into uncontrollable sobs, unless of course I have had a fight with my significant other/ life partner.  And today, it has happened 5 times.  
The everything is good in my life is great, so my only explaination is I am unhappy with myself.  And, I don't want to be rude but please don't give me any shit that everything can't be alright and me be unhappy with myself.  Because I am.  My love life has been great since the last big blow out we had in late May early June.  We have celebrated 3 years together.  We have had healthy arguements but they never last longer then 2 or 3 waking hours.  I have been able to spend a little bit of time with friends, more then I used to.  Things with my family are doing pretty good.  I love my kitty.  
The only down fall currently I am not working, and have to much time on my hands, not much to do.  
Solutions?  
And before I get the get off your ass and do something about it........
I spend 6 to 7 hours 3 to 4 buisness days a week looking for a job.  Applying. Calling.  But I haven't got a call or reply.  Currently I am "employed" through a temp agency but at this time they have not called me for a contract.

ok that's it I can't stop.
http://buttrflyxtac.livejournal.com/58245.html

So things go from really fucked up and gray hair at 22 stressful to I can breathe again.
Friday when I went in to pick up my pay check after not working for solid week I was told I was no longer needed.
How nice.  Just before walking up to get my check I found out that my major had not been cancelled but no one shared that with me.  That's besides the point.....I was estatic...I get to go back to school and finish my degree!  And, then I lose my job.  I immediatly started making the arrangements.  And then BANG!!
Well and then I started to stress out because I have a few large bills.  That TA DA with out a job I have no way of paying them.  OOOO also before I lost my job...on Friday morning I had received a job interview.  See I had a feeling I was going to lose my job so I started looking for a new job, and a few good things fell into my lap.

And then today I was supa stressed out over my old school tuition bill, that I owe to the Revenue Office and tell them I lost my job and won't beable to make my monthly payment  until i eaither get a job or get unemployment.  I spoke with Craig, what a weet man....he was a big help and lifted about 2 tons of stress off my shoulders....now for my cell phone.

That's ok.  I am going to be ok, I am going to try not to stress too much.  Nick, I love you.  You have been so supportive.

Ok so My life has been one big drama bubble for the last week and will probably be for the better part of the month.  I have had alot to think about the last few days and I am pretty sure I have come to a descicion.
One in which many won't really be happy but it is my life.  Also I am on the road to make a many changes so that things for me will run a little smother then they have the last few months.  I know there are a few people that will stand by me and a few that won't  but I am wiling to deal with that when I get there.  Even though I recieved tons of advice from people over the last few days, you were all there for me though, thank you and even though I may not have chosen to take your advice I listened with open ears, and I just wanted you all to know that I appreciated all of it.
http://buttrflyxtac.livejournal.com/56586.html

Well tonight is the night we go to the Rough Around the Collar Tour - Larry the Cable Guy & Ron White.
I am pretty exceited about it, with all that has been going on a good laugh is what I need.
Last night I recieved a call from my mother....
telling me to go to hell, and that as far as she is concerned her only daughter is 11.
I cried myself to sleep.  To tell you the truth I have never felt so alone.
She has posioned my family against me, no one will talk to me or return my calls.

I thought family was suppose to stand by you no matter what?
So why am I being disowned?  Because I love someone.

Well what's done is done.

Sooner or later I will have no one.
http://buttrflyxtac.livejournal.com/56360.html

For me to move on at this point and start my road to happiness there are things I need to say.  Things that just need to be out of my mind, so I can think clearly and be on my way up my path.

I think that I may have lost my mother for good.  As much as that hurts, I don't know if it's really a bad thing.  She has held me back from doing some of the things I needed to grow.  And,  then it hurts me terribly, she is my mothe and I love her dearly. I can't have her control my life for ever, and that has been what she has been doing and I don't even live with her anymore.  It is not her choice who I can love.
I made that choice.  She does not like it.  Oh well I don't like the man she chose but I deal with because I love her.

Enough about my mother.

There is a lot that I want right now, but there are some steps I need to do to aquire them, that won't be all that easy.  I have to decide what I want more and what is priority.

I need to take time out when I feel like I can't take what all I have put on my plate.  I need to communicate to those who are in my life.

I need to make a plan and stick to it as best I can.

I need to be me.
http://buttrflyxtac.livejournal.com/56216.html

you are deeppink
#FF1493

Your dominant hues are red and magenta. You love doing your own thing and going on your own adventures, but there are close friends you know you just can't leave behind. You can influence others on days when you're patient, but most times you just want to go out, have fun, and do your own thing.

Your saturation level is high - you get into life and have a strong personality. Everyone you meet will either love you or hate you - either way, your goal is to get them to change the world with you. You are very hard working and don't have much patience for people without your initiative.

Your outlook on life is very bright. You are sunny and optimistic about life and others find it very encouraging, but remember to tone it down if you sense irritation.

Well- Yesterday was a full day.
I went to look at a few apartments at wimbleton Square, and well I fell in love.
They have great staff, Kelly they are super nicee, they have alot to offer, and well it would be a place to go I would never run out of someplace to be alone.  But right now it's not affordable.

It's nice,  I think Nick wants to move out to.....but he'd like to be prepared.  I just want a place I can call mine.  Or ours.

On a sour note....my mother can't handle being an adult.  She is back at Nick hating again, onl;y this time
she is jeoperdizing Nick's job.  OK so I have no mother,  (she has disowned me yet again)

It makes me sad.  I love Nick, to be honest I want to marry him and have a life with him.  And if I do marry him and have children with this man, they will have to respect him and that that is my choice to make.  I am marrying him, not them, and the same or him, he is marrying me not them.  If they can not respect my husband, and the father of my children, there is no reason that they should be there for those wonderful moments I may have in my life until they understand that is my choice to make, not theirs and that I am not going to have them disrespecting him.  

Now I know it seems really harsh, it is.  But so is the way tey are acting.  They are making me chose between him and them.  I am not doing it, I am however taking his side.  they are in the wrong.  back off keep your personal feeling away from work..Tahy have no president here and no realavence.  i.e. GROW UP you are 44 years old act it.

Now for those of that maybe confused, there is no descison that Nick and I are going to get married, true it's a nice thought, but it was just for the sake of the arguement, to express how I thought about the situation and if it kept up.

Well LJ land thanks for hearing me out.

Wow, I feel like I am going in circles.
I work really hard to get things done and to get somewhere,
but it seems as if my TO DO LISTS never get smaller,

I completed, seem like I never touched them.

One of these days I just want to get up and not have a million things
racing through my mind that I need to complete.

For once I would love to follow everything through, but I get soo wore
out just trying to get the little things done.

AGGGHH.

I am just going to start making lists and as I complete things I will mark them 
off and as I need to complete things I will add it too my list.  The things that 
need the most attention and have deadlines will be highlighted.  

And lets hope that I will have an easier time, and won't feel as if I am going mad.

The best news of the year
'Family Guy' un-canceled, thanks to DVD sales success
By Gary Levin, USA TODAY
Stewie lives!

Watch out, Stewie Griffin's got a new outfit and a lot of new stuff to say, most of which can't be printed here. 

Family Guy, the outrageous Fox cartoon that was canceled two years ago, will resume production next month with 35 new episodes to premiere early next year on Cartoon Network and possibly on Fox.

It marks the first time a canceled show has been resurrected based on DVD sales. The first volume, which sold 1.6 million, was last year's top-selling TV DVD; a second volume sold another million copies. And those 50 reruns are the biggest draw on Cartoon Network's Adult Swim block of late-night programming, with 1.9 million viewers. 

Happy hey guys happy news...........


All this for a show about a blue-collar Rhode Island family, including loutish dad Peter, evil toddler Stewie and a talking, martini-swilling dog.

The comeback surprises Seth MacFarlane, who created Family Guy at 24, won a huge post-Super Bowl launch on Fox in 1999 and then watched the show founder in several time slots.

"We kind of gave up lobbying a while ago," MacFarlane says. "For the most part, when a show is dead, it's dead. It's something none of us ever expected." 

But in Family Guy's late-blooming success, 20th Century Fox Television sees a chance to profit further from DVDs, merchandise, a potential video game and the ultimate pot of gold: syndication to local TV stations, which usually requires at least 85 episodes.

"When we saw the way the fan base reacted, it obviously got us thinking there was a very pure audience that would follow it anywhere," says 20th Century Fox's Gary Newman. 

The news is equally heartening to Cartoon Network. "Getting this deal done has been my obsession for the last six months," general manager Jim Samples says. "It will be one of the things that keeps Adult Swim thriving."

If Fox airs the new episodes, it will get them before Cartoon Network

Have you ever prayed that you would die?
I don't even care how I do it.  Peacfully, painfully, or violently.
I just don't want to walk this circus anymore.
No one will miss me, I will miss few.
I am tired of failing.  I am tired of hurting.
I know thats life but that is all my life has been.
I have counted up those few happy moments I have had and it doesn't eve add up to a year.
I have few that care about me and I can't care for anyone anymore.
I am tired of living out of boxes.
I am tired of being at poverty level.
I am tired of not finding someone to love me.
I am tired of being alone.
I am tired of crying everyday.
I am tired of not knowing where I will live day to day.
And I am tired of breathing.
Yet I am too scared to do what I need to rid the world of me.

What do you do then?
Waste away?

Can someone live if their heart has been consumed by pain?

There is nothing left for me.

Paint Brush
I keep my paint brush with me
Wherever I may go,
In case I need to cover up
So the real me doesn't show.
I'm so afraid to show you me,
Afraid of what you'll do -- that
You might laugh or say mean things.
I'm afraid I might lose you.

I'd like to remove all my paint coats
To show you the real, true me,
But I want you to try to understand,
I need you to accept what you see.
So if you'll be patient and close your eyes,
I'll strip off all my coats real slow.
Please understand how much it hurts
To let the real me show.

Now my coats are all stripped off.
I feel naked, bare, and cold,
And if you still love me with all that you see,
You are my true friend, pure as gold.
I need to save my paint-brush, though,
And hold it in my hand,
I want to keep it handy
In case somebody doesn't understand,
So please protect me, my dear friend
And thanks for loving me true,
But please let me keep my paint-brush with me
Until I love me, too.

I feel like this still.  Sometimes.  
I feel like I keep things bottled up,
So that I don't hurt or upset anyone.
Sometimes it drives me nuts.

This isn't directed at anyone.  Or anything at this time.
It's just how I feel sometimes.  Tonight I was alone for a bit,
attempting to put some memories into a book.  A book that I have 
been trying to work on for years.  
It also had me thinking of all my mistakes and all my hard times, 
and those I had to call on....(tv got me started on that) some of
it made me feel good and somethings made me want to cry.  
I then started thinking about who I am, and where I am right now.
Where do I want to be tomarrow?  Who do I want to be?  How do I get there?
Who comes with me?  And who will I lose along the way?

I had so many friends 5 yrs ago....where did they all go? Why did they all go?
I used to be so sure of myself and my future.  Now I feel like I am at a stand still.
Like I don't know where to go from here.  I know what I want, but how can I get there.

I am 22yrs old and all I have to really show for it, is a high school diploma, 
and some college credits that won't get me too far at this point.
I am feeling a bit unhappy about myself.
And I don't know what brought it on...maybe it was all those damn photos and memories that followed.

I need a hug.

On a much happier relaxed note...Nick took me to this cute little coffee shop today.  Its a scottish coffee shop, I adore it! 
When we were ordering our beverages of choice (Nick- a cock n bull soda, Me-a cup of tea)the guy asked me if I wanted "a big cup or a wee cup?" I tried real hard to stiffle my giggles.  It made me day.
Silly this I know but "f@*$ you if you can't take a joke." :D

ok so I might have had a bit too much suga in my tea.
Today my cup is half full.
Quote of the day: Let there  be two.

"Laugh at your friends, and if your friends are sore; So much the better, you may laugh the more." -- Giovanni G. Casanova

"Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one." -- Christian Morgenstern

This last quote is for all those out there that have been betrayed by someone you loved, trusted, even called your friend.  Just rememeber betrayl is in the eyes of the betrayed.  What someone else feels is betrayal others may not, that is your choice.
For the rest of you take the quotes as you will.

Ok so today was my 22nd birthday whoopdido.  I don't feel any different.  I have a temp job as of right now who knows where that will go.  I am grooming other peoples pets.  Not so bad, it is some manual labor though....and the one thing I hate...is that I have to do anal probbing....it's more like putting pressure on the anal gland and then squeezing the gland...it doesn't hurt them but it makes my stomach churn.
  Nick gave me a wonderful birthday gift.....last night we went shoppign for dinner goodies and he made me three cheese tortilli with alfredo sauce, we got 2 pints of ice cream.  Strwberry cheesecake and daqarui ice, we then rented Desperado and Once upon a time in Mexico.  Which I did not see the end too.  And then today him and his mom went to Baskin and robbins to get me a grumpy carebear ice cream cake, but it would've took 2 days so he improvised it had a rainbow with grumpy bear blue background with mint chocolate chip ice cream and white cake.  
However,  the bad news on my birthday

  I tried to call my real dad on his birthday which was January 25th, but have since not received a call back..now he was suppose to get me a laptop for my birthday....and has not called me at all he said he was taking my birthday off but that was on Christmas eve, also the last time I talked to him.  My dad has this history of letting everyone down.  I was going to take a chance though, I really didn't expect to see or hear from him in the back of my heart..and by no means did I expect a laptop I would've really like to see him though.  I have lots of wonderful people that love me and tons of pent up felling towards my dad but I am trying.  He is half the reason I am here today...I can't just give up on him even though my mind is telling me to get real...my heart is telling me he is my father and I can't give up on him...not yet anyway.  I love you dad.

Other then that this birthday wasn't all that bad...no tears no anger, and no hard feelings anywhere.  Maybe I can start looking forward to my birthdays again.

Well it is just fucking amazing how childish three grown men can be.  I have my step-dad, and old classmate Jason ploting to break up my relationship.  I guess sometime last night Jason called my cell phone, (my # he got from my step-dad)  while I was out with the girls.  Nick had my cell phone so that I could get hold of him to come get me when the night was through.  All Nick told me was that "A guyy by the name of Jason Graham called and said that he would see you at "your" party tommorrow."  And hasn't talked to me since...this is hour 48.
  I went to my little sister's party today.  We went to Bullwinkles for a few hours then we came back to the community center because my little sister and her drill team had to preform for a retirement party....well who should be there besides my juvanile step-father but Jackass Jason.  The first thing he says was "How's you and your boyfriend?"  Next then he knows he is getting up off the floor with a bloody lip trying to pry my hands of his throat...as my old coach from middle shool pulls me off him....I end up feeling like a Jackass myself because 1) I shouldn't have lowered myself to their level. 2) It was my little sisters birthday party. and 3) When I get home my boyfriend is still gonna think I am a bitch and be pissed at me.
   I went to bed tonight  with yet another pillow between Nick and myself.  I had to get out of bed because that was Juvenile and made me feel like shit.  Do you even know how it made me feel that when our feet touched he recoiled as if I were going to give him some deadly disease.  So yet for night number two I will be crying myself to sleep and wake up every hour woundering if he is going to tell me yet agaian to pack my shit and get the fuck out of his life.
    You know i am seriously ready to be done with this childish shit...how can I improve on things or change things if I am not told what is wrong?  I have said this before I am not a mind reader.

  I would really for once like to know that my relationship isn't gonna end on a drop of a dime.  All but one of my friends all have these perfect little wonderful relationships were they have eaither been together forever or are engaged almost 65% of my friends are married and I am sitting here wondering if my boyfriend is going to kick me out again.  There is something terribly wrong there.  All I really want is security.  I don't want to doubt if he gives a shit anymore.  I don't want to doubt that he's not just keeping around because he feels sorry for me or that he feels obligated.

How can you move on from the pain?
How do you start all over after your whole world revolved around that one person?  How are you suppose to feel to know that that one person's life does not revolve around you?
I need to stop the hurting.

I think about all those good times and I cry, because I know I will never have those again, (I guess it serves me right.)  And then those bad times start seeping through.  It's hard to hold back those mean things you never mean to say when you're upset, they just come out.  You don't think until you have reflected on things.  That is when your lover starts to doubt you.  Once those horrible things are spoken it's hard to beleive that you can ever trust what they are telling you, or that you can depend on them again.  And it's justfully so, because the words that are spoken are often those secret fears you share or those secrets only they know.  How can you possibly trust them after they went and throw that in your face.  If you love them you're just suppose to rid your mind of those stupid fears.  
  It's not easy.  I have tried. I failed.
If you read this, I am sorry for what it is worth.  We were a perfect pair and I screwed it up because I could get over those silly insecurities.  I hope you find what you're looking for down the road, and I hope you're happy.  You deserved more then I could give you I tried though.  Please beleive that,  You will always be with me, even if you're far away.
